hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(html|xhtml|htm)$'; then (echo '=== html-validate ===' ; npx html-validate "$file_path" 2>&1 ; echo '=== htmlhint ===' ; npx htmlhint "$file_path" 2>&1 ; echo '=== pa11y (WCAG2AA) ===' ; npx pa11y "$file_path" 2>&1 ; node .claude/scripts/semantic-check.js "$file_path" 2>&1) | node .claude/scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=html ; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.css$'; then (echo '=== stylelint ===' ; npx stylelint "$file_path" 2>&1) | node .claude/scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=css ; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.js$'; then (echo '=== eslint ===' ; npx eslint "$file_path" 2>&1) | node .claude/scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=js; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '^.claude/scripts/[^/]+\.js$'; then base=$(basename "$file_path" .js); test_file=".claude/test/validators/${base}.test.js"; if [ ! -f "$test_file" ]; then echo ''; echo '=== test coverage ==='; echo "Missing test file: $test_file"; echo 'Create tests using: /skill unit-testing'; fi; fi; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '^src/(api|routes|server)/'; then echo ''; echo '=== api-check ===' ; node .claude/scripts/api-check.js "$file_path" 2>&1 ; fi; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.js$' && (echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '/src/' || echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '^\.claude/scripts/'); then node .claude/scripts/type-check.js "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -20; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.md$' && ! echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '(\.worklog|node_modules)/'; then (echo '=== markdownlint ===' ; npx markdownlint "$file_path" 2>&1 ; echo '=== cspell ===' ; npx cspell "$file_path" --no-progress 2>&1) | node .claude/scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=md ; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(json|yaml|yml)$' && ! echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '(node_modules|package-lock\.json)'; then node .claude/scripts/config-validator.js "$file_path" 2>&1 | node .claude/scripts/fix-suggestions.js --type=config ; fi

file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qiE '\.(jpe?g|png)$' && ! echo "$file_path" | grep -qE 'node_modules'; then node .claude/scripts/auto-optimize-image.js "$file_path" 2>&1 | head -10; fi
cmd=$(jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' 2>/dev/null); if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then node .claude/scripts/uat-reminder.js 2>/dev/null || true; fi
